metadata.synopsis: Three brothers (Nathan Forrest Winters, Brian McHugh, Sam Rockwell) are trapped in an old house with three escaped killers wearing clown suits.

reviews: The protagonists behave quite annoyingly and the antagonists are pathetically incapable of dispatching small children.
Winters' terror is all too real, and becomes unbearably dismaying to watch.
...feels as though it'd be much more effective as a 22-minute episode of Tales from the Crypt...
Truly creepy -- one more than one level -- debut feature from Salva.
